title: DON"T Drink!!
content:
Right now as I am typing this I am intoixacted. my little brother is passed out, my sister and her friend can't walk, my mother is being sick everywhere and my brother 9whose not sdrunk) is trying to clen up. I feel like helll now and I can say tight now that drinking sucks and Im never never going to do it again. and noone else should either.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: DON"T Drink!!
content:
Yep, fair advice.

I don't drink much (never really had the desire to...) but I imagine hang overs are not really fun.

And congratulations - you type well while intoxicated - I've seen some other people type after drinking, and... it's not pretty (typing and keyboard...) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] --------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: well...
content:
Drinking is fine, as long as you do it in moderation. Like a glass of wine with your steak dinner or something. Maybe a beer with a couple burgers. But anything more than that is, I agree, not a good idea.

Hope you feel better, LL.

title: Re: well...
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]
Seems you've had some party there, right? Wasn't your little brother something like six year so old? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Anyways, hopefully you'll clean up soon -- although only change that makes is that you make fewer typos. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Something.
content:
Good advice.

I got drunk earlier this year "in the name of Art"... we decided to see how well I could draw when I'm wasted. Long story short, not very well.

We tried to film it, but the batteries to the camera were flat so we only got about an hour of footage that barely caught me tipsy (but got some shots of me consuming an unpleasant combination of sugar, raspberry something, Jim Beam and Vodka, a spoonful at a time...).

In the end, I shouted at the ceiling to take away my ability to taste, and sculled about 200ml of Jim Beam. Worked well... I couldn't taste it, and after that I was wasted (and particularly distressed at my lack of hand-eye coordination, I'm told).

I recovered well from that one, though. Woke up at 9am the next morning feeling better than ever. Much better than the last time back in 2003 where I woke up to find a pile of vomit next to my head. The moral to this story? *shrugs*Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"This is how liberty dies--with thunderous applause." -Padme

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Well..
content:
Gnnnh, now comes the aftermath. I finaly get all those portrayals of hangover people. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img] I actualy was still drunk when I woke up, my mother [she gets drunk after 2 wine glasses] had alcohol poisoning! [On the positive, she's sworn off wine. She swore off beer after a simalar 17 year old experience, so she may actually never drink again.]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Seems you've had some party there, right? Wasn't your little brother something like six year so old?[hr][/quote]

13. He snuck some drinks too.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Poor little brother[hr][/quote]

Big brother, as in 18 pushing 19

I forgot, I don't have a sister. What was I thinking?

[quote]Quote:[hr]We now know the end of your little adventure, now share the start of it with us.[hr][/quote]

It all started over dinner, just try out this strawberry wine stuff I got. 1 bottle gone. Then try out the cheaper stuff, another bottle, followed by a third. Now we're ready to go to bed, but lo! Sarah [my friend] comes over... with bourbon and cola! And more wine! Now we're pizzed, and she mixes southern comfort into ginger beer! Now we all drink way to fast, in 5 miniutes everyone is sick, I can hardky walk. Then things get worse.

And thankyou for everyone for telling me I make as much sense blind drunk as sober.

And Retodon, don't drink drive and park, accidents cause people!

Now off to bed.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
